question: Can you use b) instead of a)?
a) self.attack('Kratt');
b) var enemy = 'Kratt';
self.attack(enemy);
options: Yes, in example a) we use name the name 'Krat' directly and in example b) we create a variable and assign 'Krat' to it.
No, this would mean a complitely different thing.
